content:
**―Ownership Perks―**


<:GE_logo:923095675942613002> **Exclusive Members Club**
First and foremost owning this NFT gives you access to an Exclusive Gamer's take on a digital version of Soho House with a vibrant community and loads of community events, contests, getaways, meetups, bootcamps etc. Mingle with the best of the best in the Esports & Gaming Community from Creators to Owners to Athletes, you'll find them all part of this club.

<:GE_logo:923095675942613002> **Communal Decision Making on Esports Teams**
Whether it be acquiring certain teams or making changes to the existing rosters we have we would love to let the community have their voice heard and participate in the process of grooming top tier talent and building up social media celebrities from ground up.

<:GE_logo:923095675942613002> **Share the Wealth**
As part of our STW program we will create a community wallet that will be reloaded monthly with a percent of shares from all team revenue and merchandise sales of which 50% will then get divided among all NFT holders. To the HOLDers go the spoils! The longer you HOLD the more you earn

<:GE_logo:923095675942613002> **Content Program**
As part of our Content Program we will use the remainder 50% of the community wallet to fund content campaigns voted by the community itself making it truly content for the community.

<:GE_logo:923095675942613002> **Merchandise**
All Global Esports NFT holders get exclusive deals and offers from thegame.store allowing them to immerse themselves even more into the world of gaming and esports by supporting not only their favorite teams or athletes but also be able to suit up in their merchandise based on their own NFT Characters.
